questions.text: Maternal mortality ratio is defined as?

options.label: A
options.text: The number of maternal deaths per 1000 live births

options.label: B
options.text: The number of maternal deaths per 100000 live births

options.label: C
options.text: The number of maternal deaths in women of reproductive age group

options.label: D
options.text: The number of maternal deaths amongst all women

questions.correct_answer: B. The number of maternal deaths per 100000 live births
questions.explanation:
Ans. B) The number of maternal deaths per 100000 live births

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Ref: Page no 796, JB Sharma Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition
  • ➤ Ref: Page no 796, JB Sharma Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition

options.label: A
options.text: A separate birthing area to be given to each patient to ensure privacy

options.label: B
options.text: Birthing in dorsal position should be encouraged

options.label: C
options.text: Encourage the presence of a birth companion during birth

options.label: D
options.text: Initiation of breastfeeding within an hour of birth

questions.correct_answer: B. Birthing in dorsal position should be encouraged
questions.explanation:
Ans. B) Birthing in dorsal position should be encouraged

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Ref: Page 803, JB Sharmas Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition
  • ➤ Ref: Page 803, JB Sharmas Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition

questions.text: The logo shown below is seen in your labor room. A curious patient asks you what it is about. You explain that it is regarding?

options.label: B
options.text: Rooming in of mothers with babies

questions.explanation:
Ans. C) Intensified breast-feeding promotion campaign

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Ref: Page 803, JB Sharmas Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition

questions.text: You are attending an international health summit as part of an Indian delegation and you are asked to prepare a 5-minute brief on maternal mortality in your country. The most common cause of maternal mortality in India is?
questions.explanation:
Ans. B) Hemorrhage

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Ref: Page no 796, JB Sharma Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition
  • ➤ Ref: Page no 796, JB Sharma Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition

questions.text: As per the UNs Sustainable Development Goals, the maternal mortality ratio needs to be brought down to how much by 2030?
questions.explanation:
Ans. C) 70

  • ➤ Ref: Page no 796, JB Sharma Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition

questions.text: A 23y primi is brought to a district hospital by the ASHA worker for delivery. She is from a rural village in Orissa. As per the JSY scheme, how much incentive does the ASHA worker get for bringing the patient for an institutional delivery?
questions.explanation:
Ans. C) Rs. 600

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Ref: Page no 802, JB Sharma’s Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition
  • ➤ Ref: Page no 802, JB Sharma’s Textbook of Obstetrics 3 rd edition

questions.text: A private practitioner (gynecologist) is very interested in doing voluntary work for the poor. Which of the following government schemes enables her to offer her services?
questions.explanation:
Ans. D) Vandemataram Scheme

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Ref: https://main.mohfw.gov.in/sites/default/files/Chapter415.pdf
  • ➤ Ref: https://main.mohfw.gov.in/sites/default/files/Chapter415.pdf

questions.text: A 30y G2 presented to the emergency with a history of seizures. On admission she is noted to be 36 weeks pregnant, and her BP is 170/100 mmHg. A diagnosis of eclampsia is made, she is administered MgSO4, and antihypertensives and labor is induced. She delivers a live 1.8kg female baby. She is admitted in the ICU post-delivery as she continues to have high BP and is finally discharged on the 5 th postnatal day with advice to follow up after 1 week. You are asked to help in preparing an audit of the Dept of OBG at the month end. This case is an example of?
questions.explanation:
Ans. D. Near-miss maternal mortality

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Ref: Evaluating the quality of care for severe pregnancy complications: The WHO near-miss approach for maternal health 2011
  • ➤ Ref: Evaluating the quality of care for severe pregnancy complications: The WHO near-miss approach for maternal health 2011
